Description

Distance based vegetation indices. References: K.R. McCloy (2006): Resource Management Information Systems: Remote Sensing, GIS and Modelling. 2nd Edition, CRC Taylor & Francis, 575pp. N.G. Silleos, T.K. Alexandridis, I.Z. Gitas & K. Perakis (2006): Vegetation Indices: Advances Made in Biomass Estimation and Vegetation Monitoring in the Last 30 Years, Geocarto International, 21:4, 21-28, online.
